name: DICEased Island
description:
Complete the task and get ammo!

A vampire fish overlord has arrived out of nowhere to ruin your day, again. And this time he's after your precious fish oil. 

Gameplay:

You are given a random weapon with a very limited ammo pool and you must complete a challange (displayed in the top left corner of the screen) to get your next refill.

Controls:

WASD/arrows to move

Space to dodge roll

Mouse to aim and shoot
